body.p: Welcome to the Gentoo Documentation Resources. This page will give you a quick overview on the documentation we provide. Most documentation is released under the Creative Commons - Attribution / Share Alike license, an open documentation license. All documentation should also be available in a printer-friendly format. To view this document, append ?style=printable to the URL.

If you find bugs in our documentation or have proposals, please use our Bugtracking System and fill in a bug report for "Docs-developer" or "Docs-user". These bug reports will then be handled by the Gentoo Documentation Project.

Our documentation is categorized and hierarchically navigatable. If you want a quick overview of all available documentation without the additional information, please use our Documentation Listing page.
